name: Mackinac Financial Corporation
description: Mackinac Financial Corporation is a bank holding company headquartered in St. Ignace, Michigan. Founded in 1997, the company operates primarily through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Mackinac Savings Bank, which provides a wide range of financial services including personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment services. Mackinac Financial is committed to delivering exceptional customer service and building long-lasting relationships with its clients. The bank offers a variety of products such as savings accounts, checking accounts, loans, and financial planning services tailored to meet the needs of both individuals and businesses. With a strong focus on community engagement, Mackinac Financial actively participates in local initiatives and supports various charitable organizations. The corporation's mission is to enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves by providing accessible financial solutions and fostering economic growth. Mackinac Financial is also dedicated to leveraging technology to improve customer experiences, offering online and mobile banking solutions that make managing finances convenient and efficient. As a community-oriented financial institution, Mackinac Financial continues to uphold its values of integrity, respect, and commitment to excellence.
